alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 6:40PM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow and sleet accumulations of a coating to 2 inches and ice accumulations of up to a quarter of an inch. Greatest amounts across higher elevations. * WHERE...The northern Catskills, Schoharie Valley, Helderbergs, central and northern Taconics, Albany and Rensselaer Counties of the Capital District, and the upper Mid Hudson Valley of eastern New York, and Berkshire County in western Massachusetts. * WHEN...Through 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
